Text: Tak e̩gba kʼo̩ma So̩l gbo̩ ka kʼAbina leku He̩bro̩n, o̩wo̩-wñ che gbe̩ne̩ke̩, oñ abo Israe̩l chaka chʼe̩do̩ñwañwala.

O̩ma So̩l le̩ la nʼaboke̩le̩ meji ku ma chʼamagboji udala udala. Odu oka ko̩ Beana, oñ odu ekeji ko̩ Rekab; ma chʼamo̩ma Rimo̩n e̩ne̩ Birot e-amo̩ma Be̩njamin (todu ma ño̩ fu Birot le̩ loru Be̩njamin;
abo Birot le̩ la ra nyi Gitaim, oñ ma te̩ta-ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ tʼeñini).

Jo̩natan, o̩ma So̩l, la nʼo̩maʼka kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ e̩re̩. E̩gba ku ma dʼinabali So̩l kpai Jo̩natan kwo Je̩zree̩l wa o̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩lu; tak e̩ne̩ ki anʼe̩ gba mʼu du rale; oñ i lewatʼabu kʼi ahio̩wane̩ kʼi ra, i ñwa nʼane̩, tak i mud achika. Odu-wñ la ko̩ Me̩fibo̩she̩t.
Taku Rekab kpai Beana, amo̩ma Rimo̩n e̩ne̩ Biro̩t le̩ ño̩ le, oñ ma lewa unyi Ishbo̩she̩t me̩rʼiko kʼolu akpanyʼane̩, abu kʼi do̩mo̩ añmi o̩ro̩ka.
Oñ ma lewʼef unyi o̩mo̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku ma anʼo̩ka wit kwʼo̩mo̩; ma la dʼe̩wñ gwunyʼu o̩la; taku Rekab kpai Beana, o̩maye-wñ, rale.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma lewʼef unyi le̩, abu kʼi dachi oj ate̩-wñ ef unyi olu-wñ, ma du e̩wñ gwunyʼu oñ ma mʼu du kpa, taku ma kʼoji-wñ da; ma la mʼoji-wñ du, oñ ma le o̩na Araba gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.

Taku ma mʼoji Ishbo̩she̩t du wʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n; oñ ma ka ñw onu kakini, Go, oji Ishbo̩she̩t o̩ma So̩l e̩nebi-we̩ kʼi tene oji-we̩ le̩ de̩; Jihofa la fʼache̩ odu-mi onu na ugbo So̩l eñini, kpʼugbo ugbe̩-wñ ge̩.
Taku Defid dohi ñwu Rtkab kpai Beana o̩maye-wñ, ku ma chʼamo̩ma Rimo̩n, e̩ne̩ Birot le̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Oji Jihofa, owñ kʼi mʼonugo-mi gba kwef o̩pe̩cha du le̩,
e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ka ñwu mi kakini, Go, So̩l leku me̩, abu kʼi do̩ ka kʼinabali e̩nyo̩ i duwa le̩, omi gwo̩nyʼu, oñ u mʼu du kpa Ziklag, e-le̩ chʼo̩me̩ kʼu ra ñw u todu inabali-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼame̩ne̩bibi fʼe̩no̩kpakpa kpa ef unyi-wñ oj ate̩-wñ, ab i atule kʼomi ñʼatene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-me̩ fai? Kʼu mʼume̩ ko bʼane̩-ile̩ te̩.

Taku Defid ñwa ñw abokolobia-wñ, oñ ma mu ma ko kpa, ma la kʼuma o̩wo̩ kpai e̩re̩ da, taku ma kʼoku-ma lo̩ko̩li o̩wo̩ʼka abukpe omi He̩bro̩n. Ma muda mʼoji Ishbo̩she̩t du, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji Abina He̩bro̩n o̩mo̩.
